item.title: Example Page
R Markdown Page
item.description: true This page provides an example of using R Markdown. x <- 1:10 y <- round(rnorm(10, x, 1), 2) df <- data.frame(x, y) df ## x y ## 1 1 -0.28 ## 2 2 1.88 ## 3 3 2.68 ## 4 4 3.19 ## 5 5 4.89 ## 6 6 5.29 ## 7 7 7.06 ## 8 8 7.86 ## 9 9 8.92 ## 10 10 9.36
